subject: Order #SSN5295
description_text:
Hi ! My name is Kristiyan Dobrev.
I have an order for Pedals and Haptic motors my order is #SSN5295 from
26.12.2026

So I saw that you guys send me only the haptic motors today and I just
wanted to get some information about the shipping process.
From what I understand from today’s email you will send me the pedals and
the haptic motors on the separately , is that right ?

Because in today’s email the information saying you guys sending me only
the haptic motors.
So my question is are you guys sending me motors and pedals on two
different shipments and how long it will take pedals to be shipped?

Thanks!

conversations.body_text: Hi 20v Wagon,  Our motors and pedals are shipped separately. The pedals will be shipped to you soon, so there’s no need to worry.

Hello!
can you guys give me an estimate time for pedals for be shipped?
Saw that haptic motors are coming tomorrow but I still have no information
about the pedals.

Thanks.

На ср, 31.12.2025 г., 4:32 service@simsonn.com
